name: Magic Hands: Dinosaur Rescue
description:
Are you ready to resurrect the centropods that had been frozen for millions of years in the permafrost?

Plot:
In Magic Hand: You will be an archaeologist who equipped with magical weapons that can break the permafrost. You will be traveling to different lands to find prehistoric animals that are frozen for millions of years and revive them. It was amazing to see a tyrannosaur roar after millions of years.

Gameplay:
Simple controls, move your finger to throw your weapon into the ice ahead and be rest assured since your weapon won't harm the sleeping animals. So just destroy them and then use magic lightning to wake them up!

Amazing Weapons:
To be able to break the ice quickly, you need special weapons that can explode like bananas, fireballs, teddy bears... and a lot more different weapons that not as anything else that you can ever thought of. Collect a lot of weapons to experience the destruction more exciting!

So are you ready to go to the Magic Hand's world to enjoy the thrill of rescuing the dinosaurs?
